comments.body:
I think it may be cleaner to check this right away
```suggestion
    actual_versions = api.get_collection_versions('namespace', 'collection')
    assert actual_versions == [u'1.0.0', u'1.0.1', u'1.0.2', u'1.0.3', u'1.0.4', u'1.0.5']
```
and this would simplify the check at the end of this test.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1108,1112 @@    monkeypatch.setattr(galaxy_api, 'open_url', mock_open)

    actual_versions = api.get_collection_versions('namespace', 'collection')
    assert actual_versions == [u'1.0.0', u'1.0.1', u'1.0.2', u'1.0.3', u'1.0.4', u'1.0.5']
